long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
translit let's you switch between alphabets for any language. read korean in latin letters or english in hangul letters, hebrew in arabic letters, and on and on...

supported alphabets and scripts:
arabic
armenian
cyrillic
greek
hangul
hebrew
hindi
kana
kanji
khmer
latin
mandarin
odia
thai
